entry.title: the moon is the only witness
entry.summary:
Author: idgaf_as

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,065Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 0

Summary: A couple of minutes later, he feels Stiles begin to stir and press closer. Apparently, the living heater in the form of Derek suited him just fine. The boy turns onto his side, fully hugging him like a toy now, and buries his fingers into the fur at the scruff of his neck. Derek feels him press his forehead against the top of his head. He goes still, listening as Stiles‚Äôs pulse beneath his head begins to even out, becoming steady and strong. The sticky scent of exhaustion gradually gives way to the fragrance of peaceful sleep

Author: Melioristicbeast

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:‚ÄúWhat day is it?‚Äù Derek demanded. ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù ‚ÄúThe day! What day is today?!‚Äù Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn‚Äôt human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn‚Äôt going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Wednesday.‚Äù ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs impossible,‚Äù Derek whispered. ‚ÄúNot really, it comes around every seven days.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis is impossible,‚Äù Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.title: Rip My Ribcage Open (And Devour What Is Truly Yours)
entry.summary:
Author: Welsh_Woman

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,531Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 151

Summary: After so many years of fighting all the strange shit that Beacon Hills throws at them, the McCall Pack are a little leery when they are visited by a Pack that claims they're there to help them become more of a team, more of a family... When the Hale Pack arrive and speak of a long standing claim to the Beacon Hills territory, Scott is instantly suspicious and combative, but Stiles wants to know who these newcomers are and what they can share. And why he feels so drawn to their Alpha, to a man that seems to be just as entranced by Stiles, despite the fact that he holds a secret that might topple the fraught bonds the McCall Pack share.

entry.title: Conceptual Mage
entry.summary:
Author: DaoOfGay

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,103Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 200

Summary: After suddenly getting better at LaCrosse, getting to date Allison Argent, and sit at the popular kids table, Scott didn't have any more time for him. Stiles is a bit lonely, but he finally decides to ditch Scott on the day of his mother's death, when Scott doesn't come with him to the cemetery. The next day he thinks he's going crazy because he sees floating symbols on things and every time he stares at them, he gets a word shoved into his head. He almost freaks out until he writes down the symbol for [Light], and his entire room starts to glow. Then he starts seeing these holes in some places, and suddenly he is somewhere else, and there's various of these breaches everywhere. So fuck Scott McCall, this summer vacation, Stiles has something new to explore.

entry.title: Threshold of the Void
entry.summary:
Author: Infernos

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,688Chapters: 1/20Kudos: 2

Summary: The Druid Council needs Stiles's help. Eight hundred years ago, druids made a catastrophic mistake, creating Tairseach Fol√∫s, a dimensional entity that feeds on supernatural life force. After devastating losses, seventeen druids sacrificed themselves to create a prison outside of our reality where the creature would be contained forever. Seventy-five years ago, a rogue druid discovered records of the prison and relocated it, anchoring it to the ley lines beneath San Francisco, where it began to degrade. The Councils formed a coalition with other supernaturals to reinforce the seals, but in this reality, those seals won't last. Now, a vengeful hunter family has allied with the druid's followers, and they intend to shatter the prison during the autumn equinox. Stiles has eighteen days to stop them and find a way to send Tairseach back where it came from, before it consumes every supernatural being on the West Coast

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 178,151Chapters: 31/40Kudos: 165

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn‚Äôt hate the cage that once held him.They‚Äôd build a stronger one.

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,333,943Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 61

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces‚Äîhuman and otherwise‚Äîare already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn‚Äôt. Protection becomes complicated. And the past‚Äîburied, sealed, and forgotten‚Äîrefuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: song of the phoenix
entry.summary:
Author: graveltotempo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 216,776Chapters: 54/60Kudos: 6,748

Summary: In a last ditch effort to save Beacon Hills after everyone else has died, Stiles channels all of his energy and magic into cleansing the Nemeton and the magical core of the town. But he is more powerful than he knows, more connected to the Nemeton than anyone can guess, and a group of kids, teenagers and adults wakes up in the middle of the night ten years earlier with a second chance they didn't know they needed and a bond they don't understand. Stiles though? Stiles wakes up with a little more.
